comments:
I20050308-1510, GTK+ 2.6.2, KDE 3.3.2, X.Org 6.8.0, Linux 2.6.10

I tried to close a form editor on a file while a commit was running in the
background and the properties view was showing.  This exception appeared in my
log, though it didn't seem to have any real effect on the stability of my workbench.

It is probably shared and already disposed by somebody else. We should 
check 'isDisposed' before attempting disposal ourselves.
*** Bug 94042 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

Created an attachment (id=21465)
added check to see if control is displosed
